> - next page button 
> - in the code base the arrow next to the image  directs to the next file not next page . the next page button is different 
> 
> 
> THINGS TO DO :

> - allignment of zoom and download buttons .
> - i will add the pr by today .
>

Remove next file button.and keep next page button
